definitions.definition: the biggest number or amount of; more than anything or anyone else:
examples: What's the most you've ever won at poker?

definitions.definition: used to form the superlative of many adjectives and adverbs:
examples: Joanne is the most intelligent person I know.
I don't eat meat, but I like most types of fish.
It was a most beautiful morning.
You'll find her in the bar most every evening about six o'clock.

definitions.definition: used when saying what is the largest possible amount or number:
examples: At most, the work will take a week.

definitions.definition: to take full advantage of something because it may not last long:
examples: It's a beautiful day - we should make the most of it.
Dunnet Head is the northernmost part of the British mainland (= the part that is farther to the north than any other part).
